channel.title: [Show off] Mongoth's models
channel.description:
Ok you might be wondering why i'm posting a showoff thread...I heard some people has been leeching some of my shit from different Private server forums (Run3L0cUs, Run3S3rv3r, etc.) When i posted a thread of my models, someone said I was leeching someone off mopar. I don't know if they're fucking with me, but still if you are the one viewing this and you're the one who is leeching my stuff, THESE ARE MY MODELS AND DON'T LEECH THEM.
PROOF: No one has the 85% complete abyssal Monster (ribs added and added Vertex weights to some parts). And i will view the materials and objects used in my project
-NOTE- I know i overkilled the poly limit but this is only a structure idea of the spine. I will rework later.
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2hxbybn.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24vit6f.jpg[/img]
I will showoff some of my models, most of you have already seen them probably from somewhere else.
-NOTE- I know not all of these would work in a server, but these are old models. I didn't know about Runescape's poly limit back then, But surprisingly the axe projected just fine in one server.
Here is a unfinished spear:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/14cr0pk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/29pvmg7.jpg[/img]
Editing my Kojack model with RSPoser: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1z48qh0.jpg[/img]
A unfinished lighthouse:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/i54t1y.jpg[/img]
Here is my old project that was never finished, the lightning titan
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2n6w8ep.jpg[/img]
Here is my very first model
Blueprints: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/95tzqs.jpg[/img]
Model: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/512a9e.jpg[/img]
I created custom animation data for (ex.) the steel titan (before DATMaker 1_37c came out). these are its TSKIN's
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/zursq8.jpg[/img]
Here is the Priority settings for the kojack (the bob testing model) weilding the staff of light. (also when 1_37c wasnt out)
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vhvxqw.jpg[/img]
Me making corp beats's animation data (once again, 1_37c never existed around this time)
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/91gy82.jpg[/img]
My 200th model ever made: :)
Model:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/o6w7mg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/553qtf.jpg[/img]
WireFrame:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/989fk9.jpg[/img]
Character wield:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zlbziq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/x5s592.jpg[/img]
A random 2H i made from randomness
Made this sword in only 20min...
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/6nqdfd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1z6h1ed.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/332yq2t.jpg[/img] DON'T LEECH MY SHIT...
I do have more proof that this is my property of my first model thread which is when iw as advertising a modelist opertunity in google. Compare dates of that faget leechers thread or whatever.
http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?t=76476 --google>rUn3L0cus
~sorry to waste your time ~leave a comment if you'd like...like it, hate it?
Explain why you hate it if so, i'd be glad to figure out how to solve what you don't like into something you will like.

312uzar.jpg743×596

item.title: [Show off] Mongoth's models
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

To decrease your poly count on the higher end models, make a low poly model of it, then do a transfer map from ur high poly to low poly, the resulting “effect” will make your low poly model look as good as your high poly!

Read full topic
